room_title: Escape room "Horror Nursery Rhyme" by Exitology Escape Room in Houston
room_description:
A mysterious invitation prompted you to venture out in the frigid winter of 1936. Right on your arrival at Duke William Owen's castle, an immense blizzard appears to settle upon the grounds. Soon after becoming trapped inside, guests begin disappearing before being found murdered.
Each death eerily reminds you of something familiar, a nursery rhyme that you can't stop hearing everywhere in the castle. You notice that all of the guests are here for the same reason. However, as more guests get killed, the less amount of time left, can you escape?
